question: Does anyone know if weakness is linked to foot pain, bruising?  As I've posted, I have broken at least one toe, most likely twice and split some toenails since Oct 2011.  Not I have what looks like stone bruises on my bug and second toe.  I suspect this is from foot rolling slightly when walking but wondered if anyone could confirm this?  No diabetes.  Only diagnosis was fibromyalgia and poss MS if symptoms worsened (which they have done), but I could never go for follow up MRI - plus I'm not ready for a diagnosis right now.  Crazy, maybe, but I'm taking a break from docs as much as possible.Thanks all.
title: trouble w/ feet?
